Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
Deprecated Interfaces
org.apache.velocity.tools.view.tools.Configurable
          Your tools now only need to have a configure(Map) method. 
org.apache.velocity.tools.view.tools.ViewTool
          Your tools now only need to have an init(Object) method. 
 

Deprecated Methods
org.apache.velocity.tools.view.tools.AbstractSearchTool.getResults()
          Use AbstractPagerTool.getItems(). 
org.apache.velocity.tools.view.servlet.VelocityViewServlet.handleRequest(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse, Context)
          This will be removed in VelocityTools 2.0. 
org.apache.velocity.tools.view.tools.AbstractSearchTool.hasResults()
          Use AbstractPagerTool.hasItems() 
org.apache.velocity.tools.generic.AlternatorTool.make(boolean, List)
          Use AlternatorTool.auto(List list) or AlternatorTool.manual(List list) instead. 
org.apache.velocity.tools.generic.AlternatorTool.make(boolean, Object[])
          Use AlternatorTool.auto(Object[] array) or AlternatorTool.manual(Object[] array) instead. 
org.apache.velocity.tools.generic.AlternatorTool.make(boolean, Object, Object)
          Use AlternatorTool.auto(Object o1, Object o2) or AlternatorTool.manual(Object o1, Object o2) instead. 
 

Deprecated Constructors
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.MessageTool.TextKey(MessageTool, String, String, Object[])
          This will be removed after VelocityTools 1.4
